basic.color: Leaf color green to dark green with spots on the surface

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Enjoy adequate sunlight, resistant to half shade，avoid strong direct sunlight in summer dormancy
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil surface is dry, reduce water in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove flower stem, diseased and rotten leaves timely
